code:
---
title: Class Diagram for OBD Platform
---
classDiagram
  %% Relationtships
  User --> OBD_Connection : uses
  OBD_Connection --> Car: gets
  Car --> Logs: A scan generates
  Logs ..> OBD_Code: contains

  class User {
    - INT user_ID
    - String name
    - String last_name
    - String email
    - String passwd

    + log_in(email, passwd)
    + sign_out(user_ID)
    + change_passwd(old, new)
    + reset_passwd(email)
    + delete_account()
    + suspend_account()
  }

  class Car {
    - INT car_ID
    - String VIN
    - String brand
    - String model
    - String year

    + scan()
    + show_logs()
    + perform_analytics()
    + show_analytics()
  }

  class Logs {
    - Enum status
    - INT occurrence_count
    - Time created_at
    - Time updated_at
  }

  class OBD_Code {
    - String code
    - String category
    - String suffix

    + get_code()
    - validate_code()
    + get_description()
  }

  class OBD_Connection {
    - String protocol
    - String device_ID
    - Boolean connected

    + connect() bool
    + disconnect() bool
  }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
